items.name: Dialla's Malefaction

But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the accuracy of nearby allies, and physical damage taken by nearby enemies. Gain stages by killing enemies while carrying the banner. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.

You and nearby allies gain 21% increased Accuracy Rating
